member.name: T:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationCheckpoint
member.summary: Represents the set of data that may be encoded in an operation's checkpoint.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationCheckpoint.CreatedTime
member.summary: Gets the optional date and time the operation was started.
member.value: The when the operation was started, or if the date and time may be found outside of the checkpoint.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationCheckpoint.PercentComplete
member.summary: Gets the optional percentage of work that has been completed by the operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationCheckpoint.ResourceIds
member.summary: Gets the optional collection of resources IDs that the operation is creating or manipulating.
member.remarks: Not all operations target one or more resources.
member.value: A collection of resource IDs, or if there are no targeted resources.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationState`1
member.summary: Represents the state of a long-running operation.
member.typeparam: The type used to denote the category of operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationState`1.OperationId
member.summary: Gets the operation ID.
member.value: The unique ID that denotes a particular operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationState`1.Type
member.summary: Gets the category of the operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationState`1.CreatedTime
member.summary: Gets the date and time the operation was started.
member.value: The when the operation was started.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationState`1.LastUpdatedTime
member.summary: Gets the last date and time the state was updated.
member.value: The last when the operation state was updated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationState`1.Status
member.summary: Gets the execution status of the operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationState`1.PercentComplete
member.summary: Gets the percentage of work that has been completed by the operation.
member.value: An optional integer ranging from 0 to 100 if supported.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationState`1.Resources
member.summary: Gets the optional collection of resources locations that the operation is creating or manipulating.
member.remarks: The set of resources may change until the indicates completion.
member.value: A collection of resource IDs, or if there are no targeted resources.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.IOperationState`1.Results
member.summary: Gets the optional results of the operation.
member.remarks: The results may change over time as the operation continues execution.
member.value: An object whose type depends on the if specified; otherwise .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationId
member.summary: A class for utilities related to operation IDs.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationId.FormatSpecifier
member.summary: Gets the format specifier for normalizing operation ID string values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationId.Generate
member.summary: Creates a new pseudo-random operation ID.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationReference
member.summary: Represents a reference to an existing long-running operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationReference.Id
member.summary: Gets the operation ID.
member.value: The unique ID that denotes a particular long-running operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationReference.Href
member.summary: Gets the resource reference for the operation.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The resource URL for the operation.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationState`1
member.summary: Represents the state of a long-running operation.
member.typeparam: The type used to denote the category of operation.

member.summary: Represents the state and results of a long-running operation
member.typeparam: The type used to denote the category of operation.
The type used to represent the results of the operation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationState`2.Results
member.summary: Gets the results of the operation.
member.remarks: The results may change over time as the operation continues execution.
member.value: An object whose type depends on the if specified; otherwise .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus
member.summary: Specifies the status of a long-running operation.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus.Unknown
member.summary: Specifies a status that is missing or unrecognized.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus.NotStarted
member.summary: Specifies a status where execution is pending.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus.Running
member.summary: Specifies a status where the operation is executing and has not yet finished.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus.Completed
member.summary: Specifies a status where the operation has finished successfully.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus.Failed
member.summary: Specifies a status where the operation has stopped prematurely after encountering one or more errors.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus.Canceled
member.summary: Specifies a status where the operation has stopped prematurely after being told to do so by the user.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus.Succeeded
member.summary: Specifies a status where the operation has successfully completed execution.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatusExtensions
member.summary: Provides a set of utility methods for values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatusExtensions.IsInProgress(Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus)
member.summary: Determines whether the indicates that the operation has not yet finished.
member.returns: if the operation has not yet reached a terminal status; otherwise .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatusExtensions.IsStopped(Microsoft.Health.Operations.OperationStatus)
member.summary: Determines whether the indicates that the operation has stopped execution.
member.returns: if the operation has reached a terminal status; otherwise .
